GeDBIT.dist

类 EditDistance

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeDBIT.dist.EditDistance
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Metric, java.io.Serializable

    public class EditDistance
extends java.lang.Object
implements Metric
    This class computes edit distance between two Strings. Insert and delete cost are considered to be the same, called gap cost.
    版本:
    2011.07.21
    作者:
    Rui Mao
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      EditDistance()
      Default constructor, gap cost (insert/delete cost) =1, substitution cost =1;
      EditDistance(int gapCost, int substitutionCost)
      Constructor, the two arguments should satisfy gapCost/2 <= substitutionCost <= gapCost *2

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      double getDistance(IndexObject one, IndexObject two)
      Computes the distance between two objects.
      double getDistance(java.lang.Object one, java.lang.Object two)
      Computes the distance, the two arguments should be of type String
      double getDistance(StringObject first, StringObject second)
      Computes the distance between two Strings
      double getDistance(java.lang.String first, java.lang.String second) 
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      main method, for test purpose.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • EditDistance

        public EditDistance()
        Default constructor, gap cost (insert/delete cost) =1, substitution cost =1;

      • EditDistance

        public EditDistance(int gapCost,
            int substitutionCost)
        Constructor, the two arguments should satisfy gapCost/2 <= substitutionCost <= gapCost *2
        参数:
        gapCost - insert/delete cost
        substitutionCost - substitution cost.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(java.lang.Object one,
                 java.lang.Object two)
        Computes the distance, the two arguments should be of type String

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(IndexObject one,
                 IndexObject two)
        从接口复制的说明: Metric
        Computes the distance between two objects.
        指定者:
        getDistance 在接口中 Metric
        参数:
        one - the first IndexObject to compute distance on
        two - the second IndexObject to compute distance on
        返回:
        the distance between the two objects

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(StringObject first,
                 StringObject second)
        Computes the distance between two Strings
        参数:
        first - the first String to compute edit distance
        second - the second String to compute edit distance
        返回:
        the edit distance between the two arguments

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(java.lang.String first,
                 java.lang.String second)

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        main method, for test purpose.
        参数:
        args -
